title: Web Services - How do I Activate the PRODA Device?
body:
1.The PRODA configuration is found in More > Settings > Configuration Settings > Practice > Claiming - PRODA
 2. Simply tick the checkbox to use the Vendor PRODA Device
3. Make your selections on the additional Claiming options as to what your organisation requires and click Save

*NOTE: Multiple practices are able to send from the same Location Code - please overwrite the Minor Site ID with the 'master' ID from your original practice at this stage.
  For more information about these options, please see the following informational articles:
Automatically Submits AIR Claim
Automatically Submits Medicare Claims
Automatically Retrieves Medicare Rpt. 
Rural or Remote Area
